participant_1.background:
I collect music and other things that represent my personality and interests.
My parents were immigrants from Italy.
I run every day because I want to be healthy and set a good example for my younger sibling.
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.
i work full time.

participant_2.background:
I start my day with a hearty stew, inspired by my idol, Thierry Henry.
I relax and spend time with my friends and family when I am not working.
i own a home with 5 acres of land.
I have a contentious relationship with my family because of my uncle's actions.
I got to meet one of my favorite Italian chefs at a marketing event.

content.text: Hi! What do you do for a living?
I'm a chef, I own a restaurant!
Oh that's really cool! I love cooking but I'm not sure I'm good enough to do it professionally
You should give it a try! It's really fun and rewarding
I think I might, I've always been interested in it
That's great! You should definitely look into it
I will! What's your favorite thing about being a chef?
I love being able to create something from scratch and see people enjoy it
That's awesome! I can imagine that's a great feeling
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta! There's so many different ways to make it and it's always delicious
Pasta is my favorite food! I love it with a good sauce
Me too! I love making a red sauce with meatballs
That sounds amazing! I'm going to have to try that soon
You should! It's really easy to make
I will! Thanks for the suggestion
No problem! It was great talking to you, have a nice day!
